statements.st: INSERT INTO evaluation(ev_kw_id, ev_precision, ev_recall, ev_fmeasure) VALUES (#{evKwId}, #{evPrecision}, #{evRecall}, #{evFMeasure});

SELECT e.ev_id, t.txt_title, e.ev_precision, e.ev_recall, e.ev_fmeasure FROM evaluation e INNER JOIN keyword k ON e.ev_kw_id = k.kw_id INNER JOIN text t ON k.kw_txt_id = t.txt_id WHERE kw_source = #{kwSource};
